 $Res = 0
 [UInt64]$MinDiskSpaceThreshold = 20 * 1024 * 1024 * 1024

 try {
 $SystemDrive = (Get-CimInstance Win32_OperatingSystem).SystemDrive

 if ($SystemDriveSpace -lt $MinDiskSpaceThreshold) {

 $Res = 1
 }
 } catch {

 }
